author: ABNewswire
title: Desert Kids Dental Offers $99 New Patient Special in April
text:
Desert Kids Dental Offers $99 New Patient Special in April for Patients in Las Vegas, NV 04-23-2025 10:30 PM CET | Health & Medicine
Press release from: ABNewswire
Desert Kids Dental, a leading name in pediatric dental care, is excited to announce a special $99 New Patient Offer available throughout the month of April for new patients. This limited-time promotion includes a professional cleaning, comprehensive exam, and digital X-rays-providing a complete dental visit at an unbeatable price.
As a top-rated kids dentist, Desert Kids Dental is committed to making high-quality dental care both accessible and enjoyable for children. Under the care of board-certified pediatric dentist Dr. Sandra Thompson, young patients receive personalized treatment in a warm, fun, and friendly environment.
Comprehensive Pediatric Dental Care
Desert Kids Dental is more than just a dental clinic-it's a center for complete pediatric dental care [ https://www.desertkidsdental.com/services/las-vegas-children-dentist ]. Dr. Thompson and her team offer a full range of services tailored to the unique needs of growing smiles, including:
* Preventive Dentistry: Regular cleanings, fluoride treatments, and sealants to prevent cavities and promote long-term oral health.
* Restorative Services: Tooth-colored fillings, crowns, and space maintainers to restore and protect developing teeth.
* Dental Emergency Care: Same-day appointments for urgent issues like broken teeth, swelling, and severe toothaches.
* Sedation Dentistry: Safe and gentle sedation options available for children with anxiety or special needs.
* Laser Frenectomies: Minimally invasive treatment for tongue ties and lip ties to improve feeding and speech development.
Image: https://www.abnewswire.com/upload/2025/04/930091b41f195cb7efd323894ae30e8a.jpg
Kid-Friendly Dental Experience
From the moment patients step into the clinic, Desert Kids Dental ensures a welcoming and fun environment. The office features a cozy, modern waiting area with an interactive iPad station and beautifully decorated treatment rooms with overhead TVs playing kid-favorite shows.
Dr. Thompson understands how important it is for kids to feel at ease. "We focus on creating positive dental experiences that help children build healthy habits for life," she explains. "This April special is a great opportunity for new patients to get started with care they'll look forward to."
Early Dental Care Makes a Difference
The American Academy of Pediatric Dentistry recommends that children see a dentist by their first birthday. Early visits help prevent dental issues and allow for early education on proper brushing, flossing, and diet. Desert Kids Dental focuses on prevention and patient education to support confident smiles as children grow.
Parents seeking a children's dentist can rest assured knowing their child is in skilled hands with Dr. Thompson and her caring team.
Image: https://www.abnewswire.com/upload/2025/04/61b32623e54f9ec85261b1688e257586.jpg
Trusted by the local Community
Desert Kids Dental proudly serves patients from Summerlin [ https://www.desertkidsdental.com/summerlin-pediatric-dentist ], Providence [ https://www.desertkidsdental.com/providence-kids-dentist ], Skye Canyon [ https://www.desertkidsdental.com/sky-canyon-kids-dentist ], and Centennial Hills [ https://www.desertkidsdental.com/centennial-hills-kids-dentist ]. With a reputation for excellence in pediatric dentalservices, the clinic has become a trusted partner in children's oral health.
Dr. Thompson is also actively involved in the community and regularly participates in outreach efforts.
Schedule Now: $99 New Patient Special - April Only
Throughout April 2025, Desert Kids Dental is offering a $99 New Patient Special that includes:
- Dental Cleaning - Comprehensive Dental Exam - Digital X-Rays
This offer is available to all new pediatric patients in Las Vegas surrounding areas. Appointments are limited and filling up fast.
Media Contact
Company Name: Desert Kids Dental
Contact Person: Media Relations
Email:Send Email [ https://www.abnewswire.com/email_contact_us.php?pr=desert-kids-dental-offers-99-new-patient-special-in-april-for-patients-in-las-vegas-nv ]
Phone: 702-660-7099
Address:9859 W Deer Springs Way STE 110
City: Las Vegas
State: NV 89149
Country: United States

author: CyberNews
title: Sigue hoy la lluvia y la vigilancia de posibles inundaciones – NotiCel – La verdad como es – Noticias de Puerto Rico – NOTICEL
text: Sigue hoy la lluvia y la vigilancia de posibles inundaciones Muchas carreteras de las áreas este y metro se inundaron ayer debido a las constantes lluvias. Una serie de vaguadas en niveles altos continuará generando alta inestabilidad en la atmósfera, la cual se encuentra saturada de humedad debido a un frente frío que se retira lentamente de la región. Estas condiciones mantendrán un patrón de lluvias intensas hasta al menos mediados de la próxima semana, informó el Servicio Nacional de Meteorología. La vigilancia de posibles inundaciones repentinas permanecerá vigente hasta el sábado, mientras que los vientos del sur disminuirán gradualmente durante el fin de semana, permitiendo que vientos ligeros a moderados del este retornen a inicios de la próxima semana. Las condiciones marítimas se mantendrán peligrosas hasta el domingo, con un alto riesgo de corrientes de resaca hasta el lunes. Para hoy, nublado con lluvias y tormentas eléctricas aisladas. Temperaturas máximas alrededor de 85°F. Vientos del este de 5 a 10 mph. Probabilidad de lluvia 90%. Esta noche, mayormente nublado con tormentas eléctricas aisladas y lluvias dispersas. Temperaturas mínimas alrededor de 77°F. Vientos del sureste de 5 mph. Probabilidad de lluvia 80%. [NOV 1] — NWS San Juan (@NWSSanJuan) Wet and unstable weather pattern, along w/hazardous marine and coastal conditions, will persist today. Please stay tuned. // Condiciones húmedas e inestable, junto con condiciones marítimas y costeras peligrosas, persistirá hoy. Por favor, manténgase atento.[#PRwx][#USVIwx][pic.twitter.com/TgjaACJzlV][November 1, 2024]
